summary: Serbia is a country in Europe, located in the Balkans. It has many neighbors, including Hungary, Romania, and Bulgaria. The country has a long history, with people living there since ancient times. It was once part of the Ottoman and Habsburg Empires. Serbia became independent in the 19th century and later joined Yugoslavia. After Yugoslavia broke up, Serbia formed a union with Montenegro, which ended in 2006. Serbia has a strong economy and offers good healthcare and education. It is working to join the European Union.
title: Serbia
